name: LD40 - Farrison Hoard & The Cave of Coins
name_original: LD40 - Farrison Hoard & The Cave of Coins
description:
Farrison Hoard the daring adventurer and renowned hoarder, goes on a quest to get the legendary Treasure Magnet™
and now he must escape with as much treasure as he can.

a/d or left/right - move
space - jump
